title: Blanket, "Sampler Blanket #8", 2004
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark brown ground with lighter shades at the top and bottom.  At the top a bright pink "Z" and "C" with a green "A."  In the lower left are light blue patterned cherry blossoms.  There are also cherry blossoms in embroidered white.  At the right are cross-stitch patterns in yellow and in the upper right corner, a light blue reindeer.
